name: algo-run-leetcode-tutor
description: AI-powered tutoring overlay for LeetCode. Get step-by-step solutions, explanations, and learning insights while you solve problems on `leetcode.com`. Built with React 19, TypeScript, Vite, and CRXJS.
extension_description: Master LeetCode problems with AI-powered tutoring - get step-by-step solutions, explanations, and learning insights to ace your coding interviews and improve your algorithmic thinking skills.
